entry.title: $2700 // Bright Bushwick 2BR 2 BATH @ Dekalb L - Knickerbocker M - No Fee
entry.content:
This classy, newly renovated 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Apartment located just 4.5 blocks from the Dekalb L and 2 blocks from the Knickerbocker M is outfitted with two large, exactly identically sized bedrooms with spacious closets and big, bright windows, an ample living room with amazing natural light, a stylish, modern kitchen separated from the living room with new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, central heat and AC, an elevator and a roof deck. The surrounding neighborhood is packed with a variety of restaurants, shopping and nightlife including personal favs Old Stanley's, Lucy's, Starliner, Bootleg Bar, Dromedary, Bushwick Bagel, La Isla, Jupioca Bubble Tea, Sally Roots, Nicandra and Variety Roasters.

No Fee
Just First Month's Rent plus One Month Security to move in
Pets Welcome

entry.content:
Building Amenities:

Beer Brewery, Bike Storage, Cold Storage, Concierge, Doorman, Green Market Area, Laundry In Building, Lounge, Metal Shop, Mini Golf, Package Room, Parking, Pet Spa, Private Art Studios, Recording Studio, Rooftop Pet Run, Wine Brewery, Wood Shop, Working Lounge
Unit Amenities: Blue Tooth Speaker System, Central A/C, Central Heat, Denison Metal, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances,

Public Unit Description:

THE APARTMENTS
The interior aesthetics of the apartments vary, creating diverse spaces that have a sense of local and global style. Open spaces, beautiful sunny views and a sense of both calm and buzzing community are available and threaded throughout the apartments and floors. There is a trifecta of finishes that make each space feel bold and original. Some have clean bright wooden details and artistic flair, some are contemporary and clean with sleek industrial and metallic surfaces and some have more classic dark wood finishes. All are beautiful, cool and modern. Outdoor spaces are available on many. The views of the city, brooklyn and queens, depending on location, are expansive and bright. The units amenities include:
Stainless steel appliances
Dishwasher
Microwaves
Washer and Dryer (In unit)
Hardwood Floors
Central Heat/AC
Bluetooth Capabilities
Outdoor Space/Terraces/Balconies
